name: BeepBox: Advancing Tunes
description:
This is a platformer game similar to sonic. It rewards the player for going fast and also rewards them for deviating off the path and exploring. This will be alot of fun to work on, with a soundtrack provided by the AMAZING BeepBox community!

CREDITS
Beef - Impasaurus
Detective Penguin - Shadetrap
Dreamscape - EB
Gravity Falls (Cover) - HiddenRealm
Heart Attack -  Impasaurus
Super Happy Fun Party Time - Zawu
(Level Music) An Error in the Desert - Lognes
